column4: hello, May i know installing which gstreamer package would solve the rhythmbox seek-bar issue?
what issue?
the seek-bar in rhythymbox is disabled
that'd be if the file type you were playing couldn't seek; what type of file is it?
or a damaged vbr mp3 without xing tags
mp3 files
try checking the files with oidua, they might be damaged
no, the these mp3 files having been playing smoothly in other distros.
and the gstreamer i installed was -ffmpeg
doesn't really matter ;] and oidua will answer yes or no definitively
I'm sure the files are not damaged :)
unless you check you aren't; but it's pointless to argue
ok, I will check :)
thanks, i wanna file a bug if it's a real bug and that's the first step
checked, there are no issues with songs,
can you post one of the lines of the output? they're vbr with xing tags?
ok, please wait a minute
could you give me the correct argument list?
oidua dir/ should work, the default format shows the info
it's just listing the artist/album name
and seek bar works well with ogg files
I read it from web that correct plugin must be installed to get the seekbar working
it's ok, i will try to fix, thanks :)
